DiaryEntry.title: DiaryEntry
DiaryEntry.description: Represents a diary entry with associated sentiment analysis and mood information.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the entry was created.

text.description: The text content of the diary entry.

sentiment.description: The mood associated with the diary entry (e.g., positive, negative, neutral).

affirmation.description: Comforting or cheerful quote displayed based on sentiment.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Emotiary application.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The userId is used for path-based ownership.
Stores diary entries for each user. The userId is used for path-based ownership. Includes all the properties of the diary entry: id, userId, timestamp, text, sentiment, affirmation
